title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may find purchasing something that activates your imagination is impossible to resist today. Perhaps practically minded friends or even your own rational brain try to persuade you to spend your money on more tangible goods and items. But your soul knows what it needs. Its possible you seek more creative expression in your immediate environment because it reminds you that another world is possible beyond the grind of just earning cash. Dr. Csar Cruz wrote, Art should comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
